exceptions.tactic: pose proof (permutation_length A (sum_leaves f) l3 l4) as Hlength.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type f : A -> nat l1, l2, l3, l4 : list (btree A) Hperm : permutation l1 l3 Hperm' : permutation l2 l4 Heq : map (sum_leaves f) l3 = map (sum_leaves f) l4 The term "sum_leaves f" has type "btree A -> nat" while it is expected to have type "list A".

original: intros l1 l2 H. unfold same_sum_leaves in H. destruct H as [l3 [l4 [Hperm [Hperm' Heq]]]]. pose proof (permutation_length A (sum_leaves f) l3 l4) as Hlength. rewrite <- Heq in Hlength. apply Hlength in Hperm. apply Hperm.
